sfwLabel.Text: Rejection Reason :

sfwlabel.Text: NOTE: You may only submit two online life insurance applications per day. If you have already met this maximum, please log in the next day to submit your online application, or you may complete the Life Insurance Enrollment/Change SFN 53803 available on the NDPERS website.

Your employer provides
of Basic Life insurance coverage at no expense to you. You have the option of electing supplemental coverage at your own expense.
As a part-time/temporary employee, you are eligible to participate in the Basic Life insurance plan for
at your own expense.
You also have the option of electing supplemental coverage at your own expense.
For rate information please visit https://ndpers.nd.gov/active-members/insurance-plans/life/.
Do you wish to make a change to your Supplemental Life insurance?
</br>Do you wish to make a change to your Dependent Supplemental Life insurance?
</br>Do you wish to make a change to your Spouse Supplemental Life insurance?
</br>If you select WAIVE, this will cancel your current supplemental life insurance.

During Annual Enrollment, you can increase your employee supplemental in increments up to per year to a maximum guarantee of without underwriting.

For amounts larger than , or in excess of up to you must complete a

The completed EOI must be returned to NDPERS and will be forwarded to the Carrier for underwriting.

If you wish to increase your supplemental life coverage by (up to maximum guarantee issue of ) and also apply for an additional amount that requires EOI, you will need to submit 2 enrollment requests (one for the and one for the additional amount which will require EOI).
Your existing Supplemental Life is
. I wish to apply for a TOTAL (existing amount plus increased amount) of
Supplemental life (must be in increments of ).

Your employee Supplemental Life insurance premium up to the first in coverage can be a pre-tax payroll deduction.
If you pretax an insurance premium, you may not change or drop coverage during the plan year unless you experience an IRS Qualified Change of Status.
Do you wish to have your insurance premium deducted as a pre-tax payroll deduction?
Do you wish to make a change to your Dependent Supplemental life insurance?
Do you wish to make a change to your Spouse Supplemental life insurance?
If you select WAIVE, this will cancel your current dependent supplemental life insurance.

When you are initially eligible for dependent coverage or during annual enrollment, you can elect it without providing evidence of insurability.</br>You may elect one of the coverage levels for your spouse and the number of dependents covered.

Do you wish to make a change to your Spouse Supplemental life insurance?
If you select WAIVE, this will cancel your current spouse supplemental life insurance.
